title: To the Store
description: To the Store is a fictional book about a little girl named Katie who loves to shop. The familiar settings, repeated sentence patterns, and strong picture support ensure students' reading success.
meta: a, for, go, goes, her, she, the, to, with
book, bookstore, clothing, coat, food, grandfather, grandmother, pet, shoes, shop, toy
Connect to prior knowledge to understand the text
Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
